  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0

  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: On 09/25/2024 hidden dangerous goods were discovered during the shipment inspection process at the DHL TMB Service Center, 8400 NW 25th Street, Doral, FL 33122 Transportation by road confirmed. Shipment also contains UN3481 Lithium ion batteries contained in equipment Class 9 Single Package or Inner Packaging(if any): Packaging Type: Case Material of Construction: Plastic Package Capacity: 500 g Amount in Package: 500 g Number in Shipment: 8 Number Failed: 8
